excerpt.rendered:
The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Wednesday 

Mung Beans Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (mung bean, celery, carrot, white onion, tomatoes, tomato, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Red Rice with Vegetables & Seed- vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (red rice, red bell pepper, carrot, red onion, cashew, almonds, leek, tomato, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Seeds Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (sun flower seeds, pumpkin seeds, flaxseed, dehydrated tomatoes, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Cake with Green Apple, Lime and Matcha – raw / gluten free / 110 g (cashew, cocoa butter, green apples, ginger, matcha tea, cinnamon, almonds, coconut, lemon, fresh natural cocoa powder, unfiltered honey)
